duties_responsibilities.duty: Diagnose and treat animals for medical conditions and diseases.
Perform surgical procedures on animals and provide aftercare instructions.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and provide them with medical advice and guidance for their pets.
Utilize emotional intelligence to provide compassionate care for animals and their owners.
Participate in mentoring and training programs for new graduates and veterinary staff.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM/VMD) or equivalent degree
State Veterinary Board License in good standing
Active DEA license or DEA licensure eligible
